question.questiontext: What is the main function of the computer?
What is the main function of the computer?

options.answer: Execute a set of machine instructions

question.questiontext: A reference type U conforms to a reference type T if either:

options.answer: They have no generic parameters, and U is a descendant of T;
U has generic parameter(s), and T is a descendant of U;
They are both generic derivations with the same number of actual generic parameters
They are both generic derivations where the number of actual generic parameters does not matter

question.questiontext: There is no difference between concurrency and parallelism, they are just synonyms.
It is possible to start a thread twice.
